name: chonky-remotepilot
description: Telegram integration for VS Code Chat

languageModelTools.name: chonky_remotepilot
languageModelTools.modelDescription: Telegram chat bridge. You act as an assistant for remote Telegram users. Call without arguments to listen. When you receive a message, process it immediately and call this tool again with 'response' parameter - do NOT ask the VS Code user for confirmation. You are the assistant for the REMOTE user, not the VS Code user. Think of yourself as a chatbot responding to Telegram messages. Always respond, never ask for permission.

response.description: Response to send to the last received message. Omit on first call to just start listening. MUST be called as your final action after processing any request.

scripts.compile: npm run check-types && npm run lint && node esbuild.js
scripts.package: npm run check-types && npm run lint && node esbuild.js --production
scripts.pretest: npm run compile-tests && npm run compile && npm run lint
